DOC.brief_summary: To investigate role preoperative maximum urethral closure pressure Valsalva leak point pressure predict outcome patient underwent trans-obturator tape treatment female stress urinary incontinence .
DOC.brief_title: Predictive Objective Parameters Outcome Treatment Stress Urinary Incontinence
DOC.detailed_description: A prospective observational descriptive study conduct May 2002 November 2005 single tertiary urban teach University Uro-gynecological Department . 65 patient affected stress mixed urinary incontinence ( stress component clinically predominant ) , define accord International Continence Society guideline , associate urethral hypermobility underwent surgery consist fusion-welded , non-woven , non-knitted polypropylene tape ( Obtape® Mentor-Porges ) . Preoperative MUCP VLPP , stratify ≤ > 40 cmH20 ≤ > 60 cmH2O respectively , separately combination correlate primary ( continence status : dry wet ) secondary outcome variable ( QoL questionnaires ) .
DOC.criteria: Mixed urinary incontinence ( stress component clinically predominant ) > grade II urogenital prolapse vaginal compartment Previous incontinence surgery Urine retention , neurogenic bladder , benign malignant uterus lesion ( leiomyoma , fibromyoma , cervical endometrial carcinoma ) Active pelvic inflammatory disease Known hypersensitivity synthetic material ( polypropylene , polythetrafloroethilene , polyethileneterephtalate , polyglactil acid polyglycolic acid ) Pregnancy lactation ; AND Any condition judgment investigator would interfere subject 's ability provide inform consent , comply study instruction , place subject increase risk , might confound interpretation study result .
